summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Finnhub API integration for stock portfolio tracker. All key requirements verified: US stocks use Finnhub (source: 'finnhub'), European stocks fall back to mock data, search works for AAPL/MSTR/BMW, real prices returned, all existing features intact.
passed_tests: Backend: All 137 existing tests passing (100% success rate)
Backend: AAPL quotes return 'source': 'finnhub' with real price ($248.05)
Backend: MSTR quotes return 'source': 'finnhub' with real price ($163.12)
Backend: BMW.DEX correctly falls back to mock data (is_mock: true, currency: EUR)
Backend: Stock search returns results for AAPL, MSTR, BMW
Backend: Multiple quotes API works with mixed US/European stocks
Backend: All existing features working: holdings, watchlist, crypto, alerts
Backend: Currency conversion working correctly for mixed currency portfolios
Backend: Portfolio summary displays converted currencies properly
Frontend: Dashboard loads with portfolio summary and currency selector
Frontend: Navigation working (Dashboard, Holdings, Watchlist, Crypto, Alerts)
Frontend: Currency selector functional (USD, EUR, GBP options)
Integration: Finnhub API key configured and working (60 req/min rate limit)
Integration: European stocks correctly use mock data (free Finnhub tier limitation)
Integration: Real-time stock prices for US stocks via Finnhub
Integration: Fallback system working (Finnhub -> Alpha Vantage -> Mock)
